strategy: Collegia Titanica armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Collegia Titanica formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Collegia Titanica of the Adeptus Mechancius

formations.name: 0-1 Emperor Titan
formations.units: One Imperator Titan or Warmonger Titan, Veteran Princeps

formations.name: Warlord Titan
formations.units: One Warlord Titan (Deathbringer or Nemesis Class), Veteran Princeps

formations.name: Reaver Titan
formations.units: One Reaver Titan (Hun or Goth Class)

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three Support formations for each Battle Titan formation

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans, both of either Standard or Support Configuration

formations.name: Questoris Banner
formations.units: Two Questoris Knights (may not mix configurations)

sections.name: Adeptus Mechanicus Allies
sections.description: Up to one third of the points available may be spent on Adeptus Mechanicus Allies. Up to one Lysander Fighter for each Warmonger Emperor Titan or Carapace Landing Pad

formations.name: Kastelan Maniple
upgrades: Add up to two Kastelan Robots: 25 points each

formations.name: Minoris
upgrades: Add one Ordinatus Minoris for 125 points

upgrades.title: Titan Legion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Add one Legate to the formation
Add one Veteran Princeps to the formation. May not be combined with Legate
Upgrade both Warhounds to Tank Hunter Configuration

Allows a Warhound Pack to operate as two independent War Engines for all purposes, including for determining the army BTS. If one Warhound is destroyed, the other one in the pack receives a Blast Marker
